template: Generate one single-sentence plain-English prompt describing a multi-case customer support automation workflow for a {business_type} that involves triage, automatic resolution of simple issues, escalation of complex cases, and performance tracking; output only the prompt text under 40 words.
filled_prompt: Generate one single-sentence plain-English prompt describing a multi-case customer support automation workflow for a managed hosting provider that involves triage, automatic resolution of simple issues, escalation of complex cases, and performance tracking; output only the prompt text under 40 words.

message.content: Design a support workflow that first triages tickets, auto-fixes simple issues, escalates complex cases, and tracks resolution metrics.
message.reasoning_content:
Okay, the user wants a single-sentence plain-English prompt under 40 words for a customer support automation workflow. Let me break down their requirements.

They mentioned a managed hosting provider, so the workflow should include triage, automatic resolution for simple issues, escalation for complex cases, and performance tracking. 

I need to make sure all these elements fit into one concise sentence. Let me start with the triage part, then mention auto-fix for simple problems, followed by escalating harder issues, and end with tracking metrics. 

Counting the words... "Design a support workflow that first triages tickets, auto-fixes simple issues, escalates complex cases, and tracks resolution metrics" – that’s 18 words. It covers all the points and stays under the limit.
